featured.text: About 200 million years ago this super-continent broke up into two continents: Laurasia and Gondwana.
Pumping this super-salty water back into the ocean can harm local aquatic life.
Upon the super typhoon warning, Nancy rushed to the supermarket—only to find the shelves almost ______ and the stock nearly gone.
Most men use more swear words, while far more women use adjectives such as “super” and “lovely,” and exclamations such as “Goodness me!” and “Oh dear!”

definition.en_def: Of the highest degree or quality; excellent.
definition.example: She is a super athlete who excels in every sport.
